text: Start my journey in Nizhny Novgorod.
Go to school in Nizhny Novgorod and met my best friends.
My parents buy first computer with Pentium 2 and Windows XP on the board. I was using PC a lot, but not for programming, just playing.
Only back in 2007 I started to use the Internet. But I had not idea what was going on...
My parents present my first phone - Sony Xperia K550i. With 128 Mb build in memory!!!
I was a well-known gamer, CS-Source, CS-Go and eventually Dota2. I had a local team! Good old days :)
At about high school I have started learn programming. Nothing interesting, just laboratory work and simple HTML. At that time I could not realize that it will become my profession.

In summer 2018 some company took a chance and hired me as a C# junior developer. I have worked there for 3 months and left the company at the beginning of spring.  I have recognized, that I don't like C# and .Net.
Study at university for Information Technology. I have taken some Java courses and taught myself hard. In 2019 I have graduated with a bachelors degree.
Work and university. The last one takes a lot of my time and energy. But I am absolutely happy with it. I have tried many different projects and got valuable experience.
Became interested in the Javascript language and front-end development. Understood that I want to be an full-stack engineer.
I have small experience in CNN for Steganography Analysis. Yeah...
Graduate a master degree with distinctions.
